attributes.action: Ban the reintroduction of circus elephants in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Great British Circus has reintroduced performing elephants in its circus which kicks off a tour today. This clearly shows that the practice, which was expected to die out naturally, has not done so. After 10 years without performing elephants this is a retrograde step

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
